document_data.name: Baggy Nanna
document_data.mainbody: '''Baggy Nanna''' was a member of the [[Sewn Sisters]], a [[hag]] coven that maintained the ''[[Soulmonger]]'' in the lowest levels of the [[Tomb of the Nine Gods]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Baggy Nanna appeared to have a bag over her head, from under which a [[cockerel]], a [[viper]], or a [[terrier]] emerged to speak for the hag.
document_data.Possessions: The hag had a [[heartstone]], a [[soul bag]], and three [[goblin]] fingers on her person.
document_data.Relationships: Baggy Nanna was a member of the Sewn Sisters, who were the guardians and caretakers of the [[atropal]] in the Tomb of the Nine Gods. For the promise of infinite souls to harvest, the coven joined [[Acererak]] in his feeding of the atropal.
document_data.History: Baggy Nanna and the Sewn Sisters had a fearful reputation in the [[lower planes]] before they started working with Acererak the [[demilich]].
